title: How to Create a Death Penalty in Sport Video Games

steps.headline: First of all, start a franchise/dynasty etc with that team.
steps.description: If you are playing a professional sports game, you can trade or cut the players off the roster. Pick up bench warmers and not good players.

steps.headline: If you are playing a college or non-professional sports game: Start the season.
steps.description: Set the depth chart to make the worst players start. Then in the off-season, cut the players. When scheduling teams, schedule very hard teams to lower the team's prestige.

steps.headline: However, if you get fired, create a new coach.

text: First of all, start a franchise/dynasty etc with that team. If you are playing a professional sports game, you can trade or cut the players off the roster. Pick up bench warmers and not good players. If you are playing a college or non-professional sports game: Start the season. Set the depth chart to make the worst players start. Then in the off-season, cut the players. When scheduling teams, schedule very hard teams to lower the team's prestige. However, if you get fired, create a new coach. Make him coach that team. Continue to simulate the seasons. After 4 or 5 seasons, you should have a terrible team with a long losing streak. Now it is time for you to take over. As the years continue after the death penalty, now under your control, the team should get better and eventually, the team will be back to the way it was, or maybe even better.  Finally, you should win your first championship (after a few years), and that is what you were trying for. Restore the team and win a championship (depending on the sport). You can continue on after that, or you can end your current death penalty "challenge" and start a new one if you want.
